name: Gensokyo Rolling Force / 幻想郷ローリングフォース
description: Let's solve the accident that happened in Gensokyo by team of 4 people! Now that the barracks can not be used, there are only four people to cooperate and proceed!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windous7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 512 MB or more video card supporting shader version 2.0 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card:
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windous7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM 512 MB or more video card supporting shader version 2.0 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card:
